title: review
description: holds a list of reviews for the provided product

review_id.description: A unique identifier for each review

product_id.description: A foreign key that links the review with the associated product

rating.description: a value representing the scale of satisfaction from 1 to 5

summary.description: the title of the review being written

body.description: the body of the review being provided

recommended.description: indicates if the product being reviewed is recommended for purchase

response.description: a response regarding the review, provided by the seller

helpfulness.description: count of how many users found the provided review helpful

reported.description: indicates if the review has been flagged as breaking rules

date.description: the timestamp for when the review was submitted

photos.description: an array of photos associated with the review

photo.description: a photo related to the provided review

url.description: a url address of the provided photo

characteristics.description: an array of characteristics associated with the review

characteristic.description: a represented characteristic of a product and it's value

characteristic_id.description: an identifier for the provided characteristic

value.description: a value representing the rating of the characteristic
